segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, seemingly lost in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water spills out, and I feel my heart sink as I notice the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she’s completely oblivious to the flood forming around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is a mix of bravery and foolishness, reaching for those cookies with determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His willingness to climb that precarious stool is both impressive and foolish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks on eagerly, her palm up, and it’s almost endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I can’t shake the concern gnawing at me as I wonder what will happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The chaos inside stands in glaring contrast to the calmness of the garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a classic scene of domestic life, steeped in a mix of innocence and neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about what will happen if that boy tumbles down and what the woman will think once she notices.
segments.speaker: PAR
